data.message: Why fb pages looks like dumb? Why? Bring back the old design...

replies.message: We’re sorry to hear that, Áron. We’re working hard to ensure that our updates improve everyone’s Facebook experience. Please let us know how we can make your experience more enjoyable here: http://bit.ly/29ObX9E. -Jordan

I'd like to have a wider range of different colors to chose from other then just blue! And a MP3 on our profile like MySpace has would be great. And bring back the flowers! The balloons are great but why did the flowers have to be removed?

Facebook if you existed in the 1930's no one would know about the Jewish holocaust or the evils of Nazism....your thought police would have delete any comment regarding ether of those two issues as "hate speech".

You censor our digital town square and thereby facilitate this ongoing  Christian holocaust!

How can I get rid of  explore? I just figured out how to turn off apps, now it's back in another way. Aquaintances are gone, as are pages  / groups. I tried sending a question about it and got an automated response thanking(!) me for the input, stating it'd be used for improving fb. No other response, and now the exact opposite happens? Please, fix this or tell me how I can fix it myself.
You took away my Family page why?
Facebook i like new update,weldone facebook

- Sara  molto bellissimo ed molto piu importante di quanto potete imaginare  , se  VOI  , generazione di facebook  , potete  aiutare  le  tenere nuove  generazioni di adolescenti  inocenti  con i consigli  gratis  in ce si guarda  il future matrimogno  , per essere le '' compatibilita -> perfette''  , per tutti i matrimogni pieni di tranquillita ed la felicita insieme con i loro futuri bambini ... !!!  ... E questa  idea  puo essere come un forte numero in crescita dei nuovi  generazioni inscriti sul facebook !  !
